mapper.select: SELECT advertiser.advertiser_id AS userId, advertiser.business_number AS businessNumber, advertiser.company_name AS businessName, user.user_name AS name, user.user_phone AS phone, user.user_email AS email FROM advertiser JOIN user ON advertiser.user_id = user.user_id

SELECT advertiser.advertiser_id AS userId, advertiser.business_number AS businessNumber, advertiser.company_name AS businessName, user.user_name AS name, user.user_phone AS phone, user.user_email AS email FROM advertiser JOIN user ON advertiser.user_id = user.user_id
WHERE 1 = 1
AND TRIM(LOWER(advertiser.advertiser_id)) = REPLACE(TRIM(#{keyword}), '-', '')
AND TRIM(LOWER(user.user_name)) = TRIM(LOWER(#{keyword}))
AND REPLACE(TRIM(user.user_email), '-', '') = REPLACE(TRIM(#{keyword}), '-', '')
AND REPLACE(TRIM(user.user_phone), '-', '') = REPLACE(TRIM(#{keyword}), '-', '')
AND REPLACE(TRIM(advertiser.business_number), '-', '') = REPLACE(TRIM(#{keyword}), '-', '')
AND REPLACE(TRIM(advertiser.company_name), '-', '') = REPLACE(TRIM(#{keyword}), '-', '')
-- 기본 검색 없음

SELECT advertiser.advertiser_id AS userId, advertiser.business_number AS businessNumber, advertiser.company_name AS businessName, user.user_name AS name, user.user_phone AS phone, user.user_email AS email, user.user_id AS userCursor FROM ( SELECT user_id FROM user WHERE user_role = 'ROLE_ADVERTISER'
AND TRIM(LOWER(user_name)) = TRIM(LOWER(#{searchDTO.keyword}))
AND TRIM(LOWER(user_email)) = TRIM(LOWER(#{searchDTO.keyword}))
AND REPLACE(TRIM(user_phone), '-', '') = REPLACE(TRIM(#{searchDTO.keyword}), '-', '')
-- 기본 검색 없음
AND user_id > #{cursor}
ORDER BY user_id ASC LIMIT #{size} ) AS temp JOIN advertiser ON advertiser.user_id = temp.user_id JOIN user ON user.user_id = advertiser.user_id
